title: IneoQuest Focuses on Network-Wide Video Intelligence at IBC 2015
text:
IneoQuest Focuses on Network-Wide Video Intelligence at IBC 2015 Video Quality Assurance Experts to Preview New Service Quality Management Technology September 08, 2015 03:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
BOSTON--( BUSINESS WIRE )--IneoQuest Technologies, the globally deployed experts in business-critical video monitoring, reporting and analytics solutions for broadcasters, content owners and mobile and fixed line service providers, announced today that they will be showcasing their end-to-end video assurance services and solutions for both linear and OTT/adaptive infrastructures at IBC in Amsterdam from September 11-15, 2015. IneoQuest will also be previewing its latest technology for linear network Quality of Service (QoS) management. 
From content origin/headend to viewer, IneoQuest’s solutions provide in-depth video intelligence across an ever-evolving array of distribution networks and devices. By measuring and aggregating metrics in real time from multiple key points within the video distribution chain, including content preparation, network delivery and device playback, IneoQuest’s solutions allow content owners and service providers to quickly and accurately determine the performance of and demand for their video service. And when quality or audience behavior issues are detected, end-to-end correlation allows the cause and location to be quickly identified and addressed, enabling IneoQuest’s customers to take the positive actions needed to propel their video businesses to the level their viewers demand. 
“The tools and technologies we are demonstrating at this year’s IBC show are critical to the effective operation of any video distribution business,” said Kurt Michel, Senior Marketing Director at IneoQuest. “The industry is scrambling to meet the demands of today’s always-on viewers, and this is driving complexity to levels never before seen. At the same time, viewer quality expectations continue to increase, and subscriber churn is often a reflection of quality issues. Our comprehensive set of services and solutions offer the focus and visibility that our customers must have to manage both their traditional and emerging video-based businesses, and reduce churn.” 
In addition to previewing its latest quality of service management technology, IneoQuest will be demonstrating the following at IBC: Audience Measurement Platform (AMP) for OTT/Adaptive Media Unprecedented real-time visibility into playback quality and resulting audience behaviors made possible through the AMP Endpoint Analytics SDK Real-time correlation of QoS and viewer behavior down to each device Simple, comprehensive UI with deep drill-down capabilities across disparate delivery networks Headend/Origin quality of content (QoC) preparation validation with the latest DVA 4.0 technology Comprehensive video intelligence tools that quickly correlate the relationship between content preparation quality at the headend/origin, the impact on viewer QoS, and the resulting viewer behavior - all through a single user interface. Virtualized Solutions which provide a path to SDN/NFV 
Visitors are encouraged to discuss their toughest video quality challenges with IQ’s video quality experts at IneoQuest’s stand (Hall 3 - Stand number 3.A23). 
About IneoQuest Technologies 
IneoQuest provides the world’s leading media companies and service providers the critical insight needed to keep viewers engaged on any device across any network. Recognized as an industry leader and innovator by Deloitte, Red Herring, Inc., Frost & Sullivan, and others, IneoQuest’s patented solutions continue to set the standard for measuring video quality and viewer behavior.
